subject: Immigration and Emigration
Athletics and Sports
Citizenship
lead_paragraph: United States immigration officials have agreed to let foreign athletes keep playing in the country as long as they leave after 10 years and apply for a new visa. The change came in a new policy memo issued by United States Citizenship and Immigration Services, after months of lobbying by sports leagues and lawyers for foreign athletes.
